hint: Apply predicate pushdown and convert comma joins to explicit JOINs for better planner optimization while maintaining safe, predictable transformations.
Isolate selective date_dim and customer demographic filters into CTEs, then restructure joins to reduce early Cartesian products.
Materialize all filtered dimension and fact table subsets into CTEs before joining, aggressively reducing row counts before the self-join.
Break the self-join pattern by computing aggregated ticket-level metrics first, then join to items separately to eliminate duplicate fact table scans.
